data_table.description: The CKD Exam was conducted between 2007 and 2009. This dataset includes history of dialysis and kidney transplant.

variable.name: DIALYSIS
variable.description: Have you ever required dialysis for kidney failure?

variable.name: DIALYSISYR
variable.description: In what year or how old were you when you first received dialysis? Year

variable.name: DIALYSISAGE
variable.description: In what year or how old were you when you first received dialysis? Age

variable.name: DIALYSISCURR
variable.description: Are you currently receiving dialysis for kidney failure?

variable.name: KIDNEY
variable.description: Have you ever received a kidney transplant?

variable.name: KIDNEYYR
variable.description: In what year or how old were you when you received a kidney transplant? Year

variable.name: KIDNEYAGE
variable.description: In what year or how old were you when you received a kidney transplant? Age
